definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: There will be a demilitarized , federated United States of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 將非軍事化，聯合美國，歐洲。

sentences.english: The economic backdrop to militarization is changing .
sentences.chinese: 軍事化的經濟背景正在改變。

sentences.english: They should not have military-like dresses.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有應有軍事化的脫着。

sentences.english: Militarization of Japan, leading to autarchy, and war in China.
sentences.chinese: 日本的軍事化導致專制統治及侵華。

sentences.english: Does China have a militarized police force?
sentences.chinese: 中國有軍事化的警察部隊嗎？

sentences.english: Tubo regime's expansion is the inevitable outcome of militarization system of Tubo regime in earlier stage.
sentences.chinese: 吐蕃東擴是吐蕃王朝前期軍事化體制的必然產物。

sentences.english: Senior official Xu Qiliang of the Chinese Air Force said recently that the militarization in outer space is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 中國空軍高官許其亮近期稱，外空軍事化不可避免。

sentences.english: The demobilized soldiers were reformed into unofficial semi-military organizations.
sentences.chinese: 復員軍人被改編組成非正式的半軍事化組織。

sentences.english: The quasi-military management of the students is one of the training features of our college.
sentences.chinese: 學生半軍事化管理是我院三個培養特色之一。

sentences.english: In the 1970s', the militarization had penetrated into the whole nation and all the people were regarded as soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 七十年月軍事化辦理滲入各個範疇，全平易近皆兵。

sentences.english: China IS militarizing the region, no one else.
sentences.chinese: 只有中國在對該地區進行軍事化。

sentences.english: She accused Britain of militarising the islands.
sentences.chinese: 她指控英國將這片島嶼軍事化。

sentences.english: Obviously you are unaware of the militarization of space.
sentences.chinese: 顯然你沒有意識到太空的軍事化。

sentences.english: A highly militarized zone, it is off limits to foreign journalists.
sentences.chinese: 一個高度軍事化的地區，這是限制了外國記者。

sentences.english: Shed area public security security implementation militarization management.
sentences.chinese: 舍區治安保衛實行軍事化管理。

sentences.english: Peacekeeping operations must exercise caution in the use of force and avoid excessive emphases on military options.
sentences.chinese: 維和行動應慎重使用武力，避免過度軍事化。

definition: term of office/while holding a post
